author: heinz.gassner
title: DID Application Blueprint
description: DID projects often jump early into programming solutions, without having sufficiently focused on a rock-solid underlaying architecture
solution: With this proposal we want to deep-dive and establish a solid interoperable architecture Blueprint for DApps building upon Atala PRISM DID
experience: More than 30 years of industry-leadership experience combined with direct access to specific domain experts
